description:
Want to turn your Palm device into an interactive preschool A to Z tutor for your little one?
Then you have found the right app.
This application shows fun images which can help kids learn and memorize alphabets.
The application supports two different orders.
The Linear order presents letters in alphabetical order (A, B, C, D,...). This is good for beginners
when starting to learn alphabets.
The Random order presents letters in random order (e.g. D, G, Z, B,... or some other random order).
This order can be used as a "challenge" mode for kids who have reached advanced stage.
Both lower and upper case letters are provided.
The app is ad-free and the images are drawn by an artist who has more than 10 years experience teaching arts to kids.
